website_summaries.verdict: Affordable monitor that still has some high-end features.
pros: Features 2 HDMI ports, black stabilizer to make dark scenes in games easier to see, great resolution and color, and an ultra-wide 21:9 aspect ratio
cons: This monitor doesn't have DVI, Display Port, or VGA ports
some have arrived with dead or stuck pixels

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Monitors.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 4 of these for my husbands computer desk. He loves them! No complaints! Fully mountable and pretty light weight as well. The only thing that kinda stinks about them is the power switch is on the bottom. So if you plan on stacking them like this you cannot stack them too tight or you cant power them individually. The power switch is a joystick like button.
customer_reviews.author: Bri Davis

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: Wow..... just wow. Can not beat the quality for the price. I looked and looked and looked. i am not disappinted at all. Running the hdmi cord that comes with the monitor on a gigabyte 1070 graphics card. It reconized and adapted perfectly. I manually raised to 75hz with no problem at all. Running now on 2560x1080 native at 75hz. Anyone debating do not hisitate. I love love love this monitor. The colors are perfect. I wanted 144hz but u just cant beat the color quality and price on this. I will be buying a second and waiting until OLED monitors are buyable.
customer_reviews.author: Butlerjrwa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful with a WARNING
customer_reviews.text: This screen is beautiful! I do a lot of graphics and videos on my Macbook Pro Retina 15" for my job and this screen is the perfect companion to it. I was afraid that 25" wasn't going to be big enough to replace my former two screen setup but it is a great size. Video editing is a dream with this screen. I will say that this will not work natively with Apple products. They do not support the 2560x1080 resolution that this screen requires. I had to buy a third party app called SwitchResX in order to use it properly. It is only a $5 one time by for it so it is well worth it in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Reverend Tubby

customer_reviews.title: A very solid stand and VESA 75mm X 75mm mountable make this an great "bang4buck: monitor
customer_reviews.text: The same width as my 27" 16:9 monitor and with this 21:9 display the top of the screen is not block from view by the rims of my grasses. The display is outstanding in every way. LG's OSD menu and one button "joystick" control is the easiest system I've ever used. A very solid stand and VESA 75mm X 75mm mountable make this an great "bang4buck: monitor. Thanks LG for NOT putting in speakers. (I hate bad sounds)
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Ultra Wide Display!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these for about 4 months. Everyone loves them. You can open up two full size applications side by side without the need for resizing. We are using these with mac mini's and they have performed flawlessly. Make sure your computer can support this kind of resolution. I can't comment on their gaming capabilities as we use them for design but they really look stunning!
customer_reviews.author: J. Childers

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is great and the colors are really vibrant
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great and the colors are really vibrant. A couple things to remember before buying this monitor, it has a matte finish, two widescreens might be too wide. Matte finish is great when you do not want any sort of glare. The software for the widescreen monitor can be useful if you like to multitask and share your screen.
customer_reviews.author: Moshabeer H.

customer_reviews.title: Inputs failed after 10 days of use.
customer_reviews.text: I really had high hopes for these monitors. I gave them almost two solid weeks to prove themselves but after 10 days the inputs started failing and they each started having issues connecting to my laptop. It started with each of them flickering on and off a few times a day, and today one of them completely failed to connect to my display. To make sure it was the monitors and not my laptop/docking station I had my old monitors on hand and as soon as I connected them everything worked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: K&K

customer_reviews.title: Great screen, replaces one of my old LCD dual-monitor ...
customer_reviews.text: Great screen, replaces one of my old LCD dual-monitor setups. Plenty of screen real estate. Only thing is, make sure your video card can support 2560 x 1080! Mine actually did not but luckily I had another video card I could use. Also, some video cards only take mini HDMI plugs; you can find regular-to-mini HDMI cables for cheap here on Amazon (there are 3 varieties of HDMI: micro, mini, and regular).
customer_reviews.author: R. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great HD display
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this monitor for a little about two months as of the writing of this and I have to say that I am really impressed. I have it set in game mode which provides a bit better color but it really pops. Add in the 21:9 widescreen in 1080p and this thing is gorgeous when sitting at a desk. Very energy efficient and with plenty of configurable menu items this unit is a great addition to my system. I am considering a second one in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: The wide format is great
customer_reviews.text: Love the wide format and layout options. The monitor looks great and the image is a lot better than any previous monitor I've owned. It works well for movies, writing and the CAD programs I use. Having the extra space side to side is really useful for menu's and toolbars. The stand is very basic but functional and seems stable. Overall I'm very pleased with this monitor and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It is big and pretty. More than enough horizontal space to stack windows ...
customer_reviews.text: It is big and pretty. More than enough horizontal space to stack windows side by side. It is like having dual monitors without the divider. I game a lot and some games can be really picky about the wide screen resolution. They cut costs here and you can tell in the base and in the casing around the monitor but it's obvious no costs were cut with the screen. 2 HDMI and a 3.5mm audio out. I vesa mounted mine and ran into trouble fitting two HDMI cables next to the mount, I bought two right angle HDMI adapters to rectify the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Bryn Evans

customer_reviews.title: Monitor was great
customer_reviews.text: After just over a year worth of use the monitor just started giving a black screen. After that first initial black screen everything booted up after that monitor stayed on for maybe 10-15 mins then it cut out to a black screen again. Had to trash it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay G. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: What I was expecting.  UPDATE: Still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for a great price. Im a gamer and I love the wide view this thing offers. Easy to set up and get playing. UPDATE: Its been a while since I bought this monitor and it is still going strong. I honestly don't relate with any of the problems people are complaining about. I have had zero issues with this monitor and I am very pleased with its performance. Honestly cant get a better deal for 2k monitor than this and Ive checked. Destiny 2, Battlefield 1...all look amazing on this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W.

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice looking monitor
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice looking monitor. The colors are much better than my Acer 23 inch, However, I'm planning on returning for 2 reasons. First, there is no way to adjust the angle of the display. While on my desk, it is facing my chest and I cannot tilt it up so it faces my eyes. (I know its a minor thing but I will forever be asking why they could not make it adjustable...) The 2nd reason.. it is too small. To compensate for the wide resolution, the height resolution is much smaller than I had realized. I had read other reviews that made this point and I should have listened to them.
customer_reviews.author: cErick

customer_reviews.title: Treat yo self.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a huge monitor! I’m able to have 2 documents side by side on this screen. I love it! Working from home, this was the best purchase I made for myself. I hook it up to my work laptop and maximize the benefits of it that way. One document on the laptop, 2 on the monitor. That’s the way to work! Saves time flipping between documents and tabs, either for school, play, or work.
customer_reviews.author: LaurindaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: attractive monitor with neat features for a good price. Dun
customer_reviews.text: Compact, attractive monitor with neat features for a good price. Dun. I'd like to have a ultra-wide QHD version for more vertical pixels, but we're at a specific price point here. I use this for gaming and my second workstation, and it's awesome. (Primary has a 27 FHD and a 24 FHD side by side, otherwise I'd be fine using this for day to day work).
customer_reviews.author: JohnNE

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.text: Initially purchased as a travel monitor, I bought a second LG UM57 25UM57 25-inch to replace my Viewsonic monitors mounted on my standing desk in my home office. It's setup to work with my Mid 2012 Apple MacBook Pro 13, which is connected to the Matrox DualHead2Go. The cable matters Gold Plated DVI- to HDMI adapters were purchased along with this monitor to get things working with my existing setup.
customer_reviews.author: Dale-Kurt M.

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. Note that the uncommon resolution means you ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. Note that the uncommon resolution means you really need to make sure the video and monitor drivers are up to date. Occasionally when I dock my laptop the resolution is wrong and I have to reset my USB video hub. Not really a problem with the monitor, it is the laptop and video connections. Nonetheless if the monitor was one of the typical resolutions this would not happen.
customer_reviews.author: CalifGuy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor. I wish the stand was a little higher, but even so, excellent monitor. Excellent picture, colors, sharpness, and the modes are great. The power button is quite innovative. I managed to OC this monitor to 75hz, serves great for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Best option to make I was using a TV for ...
customer_reviews.text: Best option to make I was using a TV for the longest time to act as a monitor cause I don't have much money but once I bought this and replaced it out for my TV it was the best decision I have ever made the whole image qulaty is just way more crisp then my TV although if you do need to use something and don't have much money a flat screen will do but yeah like I said best choice never going back unless this monitor breaks and lg don't replace it under warranty
customer_reviews.author: urbea97

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful screen. A lot of people don't like the 2560x1080p resolution but I personally love the extra work space and it's fantastic for gaming. Can't wait until Feb 1st when the Final Fantasy 12 remake launches on Steam. They just announced it will have support for 2560x1080 resolution so I think I'll get to put this awesome monitor to good use :D
customer_reviews.author: Ash Ketchum

customer_reviews.title: Good widescreen monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good widescreen monitor for the price. I recently moved to a job that is remote and needed to set myself up with a home office.I wanted to replicate my previous side-by-side dual monitor set up without taking up as much real estate and this monitor fit the bill. The width is perfect but it's shorter than I would have liked. I needed to purchase a riser in order to see the monitor behind an open laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Linux workstation
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a work station and Linux (my applications use a lot of windows). The monitor is quite wide and sort (just as the resolution suggests). Once out-of-the-box and plugged in, it took a bit of effort to add the new resolution mode to my Linux distribution (my Gigabyte Brix i3 5010 supports this monitor). Once done, the display is perfect. It has several different "modes" to select from (I am using Gaming - RTS). Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Moke

customer_reviews.title: It'll last a year. Then die.
customer_reviews.text: Decent price, but 1 year and two weeks later, it stopped working. Warranty is 12 months, so not worth the cost to ship it back, wait four weeks and pay to have it repaired and shipped back again. So it's your call, is 1 year what you expect out of a $175 monitor. If so, buy it. If not, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Only review actual purchases

customer_reviews.title: Good editing monitor
customer_reviews.text: I am a Newborn Photographer, and I needed an IPS monitor that would work for me. I am on a slight budget so I went with this LG monitor to use with photoshop. It's a huge difference from my TN monitor (which was calibrated). You can tell the difference. Nothing negative so far. It feels different editing with this though. Color of the images are a lot different than the old edits on the other monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amandabears

customer_reviews.title: Great with a mid 2010 Macbook Pro!!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is absolutely fabulous!! I purchased this to go with my mid 2010 Macbook Pro and right out of the box it hasn't disappointed me. You will need to get an adapter to use to get the full 2560x1080 resolution to work. People have been using SwitchResX to control the resolution but it's too involved when it's easier to just have the right cable. That is a ! You won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Canale

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is affordable and great. I loved it so much that I bought two! The colors are amazing and accurate. The bezels are thin and elegant. The viewing angles are amazing. I game on these monitors all the time and even though they are only 60hz and I think a 5ms response time they are still amazing. I would recommend these to anybody looking for a great IPS monitor for productivity and gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Bought two, one died
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these monitors on January 31, 2017. One of them stopped working on Thanksgiving day. Since I had two I was able to swap power supplies and changed power outlets and eliminate that possibility. The monitor simply will not turn on, no power light - nada. Leaves me wondering how long my other monitor has. Contacted LG and they provided me with a return label since it is still under the 1 year warranty. This is the first time I have had a monitor die on me, but there is a first time for everything I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: krysten hanson

customer_reviews.title: 2 years and going strong, daily use
customer_reviews.text: 2 years after purchase, this is my main work monitor and I CANNOT LIVE WITHOUT IT. I put an arm swing on it and it looks amazing. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Decent Multitasking Display
customer_reviews.text: This screen is nice, but isn't the largest display. If you're looking for something tall, this isn't the display for you. Otherwise, colors aren't too bad, and the screen works well for multitasking. Being a college student I use this as a secondary display for my excel projects, having multiple windows open, and keeping my music player up. Decent display.
customer_reviews.author: David Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: The widescreen looks great
customer_reviews.text: I know its only 1080p but the widescreen lg picture looks great, but you might want to upgrade to something with a faster hertz refresh rate.
customer_reviews.author: GoldenGod

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming and for work!
customer_reviews.text: Ive got two for my set up and these are amazing! I do alot of editing with a hobby of gaming on the side and the response time these have are great! It has a gaming mode on it that guarantees a fast response time. It always is really helpful when it comes to multitasking because of the amount of space you have on the screen. Great monitor for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana Peralta

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: This still is courgious. It took sometime to make it work properly with my Mac mini but eventually, with the proper software, it worked great. Happy with the quality. Couldn't say anything bad.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos J. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great monitors, but...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these monitors for about 5 years now and they're great monitors. My only complaint is the stands are very, very short, and do not raise. Additionally, they do not rotate on their stands. The picture quality is great but because they're ultra-wide you lose verticle space. These are a few of the things I didn't think of when I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T Garvin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Gaming
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 1 of these just to try it out and see if I liked it since my current monitors are old and the pictures are not very good. It's great. The size is a little hard to get used to if you're not used to widescreen but other than that, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gambino

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor, but I did have shipping mistakes.
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased the monitor and when I got it I noticed it came with a power supply that wasn't for the monitor? Weird? Well it's an extra power supply so I can't complain. What I can complain about is the fact that the stand it goes on takes two thumbscrews and mine didn't come with any. Its annoying because I have to go out and buy two now but it's not the end of the world. I doubt anyone else will experience this.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: I love the Ultrawide Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Finally reviewing this after having this for almost 2 months. After my older Samsung bit the dust we decided to go on Amazon and do our research on a brand new monitor. We've always wanted to try the ultrawide monitors as they seem really useful. We do a ton of multitasking and really need to do 2 or 3 things at once. It's wide enough to put 2 separate projects on the screen without it feeling too narrow. Trying to convince hubby to purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Gamer506

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, but awkward placement of jacks
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful monitor, great image (at least for general use -- I'm not doing video or image editing). The main reason I took away one star is the placement of the jacks in the back seems a little short-sighted; they are right in the middle, so when trying to hook up a monitor to a mount they can get in the way, especially as the HDMI cable sticks out quite a bit. I had to get a 90 degree HDMI adapter, and even then it's in the way. Aside from that I'm happy with the purchase. Split screen feels like two proper work spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Matar

customer_reviews.title: All my monitors will be LG from now on.
customer_reviews.text: Nicest thing I ever bought for my computer. It is gorgeous looking just alone and the picture is amazing. I haven't had any resolution issues with games. I have had this product for about a year now with 0 issues. The only issue I can see is it does sit low. Which is okay in my case because of how my desk works however it should be noted that the stand is not that tall. LG will be the only monitor I purchase from now on.
customer_reviews.author: NIck

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: The is easily the best monitor you can buy for less than $200 right now. When people see the size and picture quality they immediately think it's a $500-600 monitor. Some people mention that it doesn't wake up on it's own when you move the mouse or type the keyboard, but I'm not sure I understand that because I keep my laptop plugged into it with the lid closed and I only move the mouse to start it up every time. Works perfectly with Windows 10 (haven't actually tried the Mac Air on it yet but I'm sure it'll be fine). Very happy with it obviously.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: great space saver
customer_reviews.text: I moved to a corner desk in my home office and bought this to replace my dual monitor setup since I didn't have a much space at the new desk. I have enough screen space for a Skype window, email and another one for whatever I'm working on CAD, Visio etc. It has an audio out jack which is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: No bells or whistles, just a solidly made monitor for a very good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these and a Sapphire Radeon dual HDMI card and can now work on four Word documents and have a web browser window to look up references and clarifications all at the same time. Running the two at 5120 by 1080 resolution = workaholic heaven. Video plays fine, don't know much about game FPS and refresh rates. For someone who actually works on his computer, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita B. Katz

customer_reviews.title: Really like this monitor but......
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is nice but wish it was taller as I have next to 27 and 32 inch curve monitor. For this price tho I will sayin highly recommend for gaming if u like ultrawide.
customer_reviews.author: garrette porter

customer_reviews.title: Other than that they are fine. nice picture
customer_reviews.text: The main reason for 4 stars is because they say display port in the description but it does not have one. Other than that they are fine. nice picture, not noticable lag, they have vesa mounts and are in a triple eyefinity right now(you will need an active DP to hdmi but it works fine). I like them but the only other thought is they are not very tall in screen height and its more so noticable because of their length. The bezels arnt too bad if you make them overlap. Stands are good and sturdy. good product but misleading on the page.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Affordable ultra-wide for folks who aren't particular about bells and whistles. Pretty solid buy for the budget gamer. Has two HDMI inputs and an easy to use switch to adjust settings However, be aware that there are no built-in speakers so you're going to have to hook-up your own. The monitor itself also sits much lower than initially expected and is a bit stubby.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great monitor but amazon warehouse did not include the mounting screws and the screw covers.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kerbel

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect, the screen is vibrant. The only thing is the bottom of the stand is a little flimsy but still this beats anything else that I was looking at. The install was super easy and shipping was fast. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Smith

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because my work monitors are terrible and I needed the screen real estate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my work monitors are terrible and I needed the screen real estate. It does its just phenomenally. Colors are amazing, view angles excellent, no light bleed, easy to set up. Just everything about it is excellent. The only thing I wish, is that Id bought a larger size. I have it paired up next to a LG 22M33 and the sizes don't line up, should have gone with a 29" but that's my fault 100%. I still really like this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Blackie

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this monitor. The color and image is crisp and clear, and the size isn't too unbearably big for the space on my already somewhat-limited desk. I plan on ordering a few more of these badboys for a good 3-4 monitor setup, and judging by the connectors on the back, it shouldn't be out of the realm of possibility to stack them 2 or 3 high. The bevel around is still kind of wide, but definitely smaller than some other monitors I've used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Tylor Mansur

customer_reviews.title: Returned because the wrong model was shipped to me.
customer_reviews.text: It was much smaller than expected, and I returned it because the model I ordered was not the model that arrived.
customer_reviews.author: T. O.

customer_reviews.title: One you go wide, you won't go back.

Windows 8 natively supports this resolution without problems. now that I think of it, I never used the top or bottom screen real estates as much as the peripheral. I'd just never thought of it before. Just the single 25 monitor feels like running dual 20's, approximately.

Playing games on it response is good enough for me (casual gamer) and having the xtra wide field of view helps in games that support it.
customer_reviews.author: Fire 304

customer_reviews.title: Installed in our van
customer_reviews.text: After an exhaustive search for a monitor that would fit in our e150 van, I found this one could replace the large tube tv. We have a 4g wifi router that worked flawlessly with this monitor on the end a smart wifi dvd player. I have a cable routed from the headphone jack to the van stereo. After 4800 miles on the road, my kids were wanting to finish their shows before getting out of the van.
customer_reviews.author: technobuyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, picture quality is great too. Might need to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: the best monitor you will ever find for $140

customer_reviews.text: This monitor is wonderful for both work and play. My games look great, and I can have multiple documents open side-by-side without any problems. The installation was a breeze. Furthermore people saying get the 29" but IMO anything over 27" got to be 1440+ and not 1080. If ask me, on a budget?, want to go ultrawide? this is a good deal. Size comparison: [...]

I give this monitor a two because i am not the only one who had experienced these issues.

Actually game developer, programmer, photographers who look for budget monitor and let the job done great, pick this one... ^_^

I would however suggest the 29 inch version since it's the same price as this was when I bought it and 25 can be a little small if you're not sitting close.

customer_reviews.author: Anthony
